english.segment1: Why are you crying. Did I say something wrong. Werent we just talking. Tell me whats going on
english.segment2: Cause Im pretty sure my intentions. Were nothing more than conversation. Maybe you just needed someone. To listen to your heart
english.segment3: Maybe I spoke too soon. Maybe I said too much. Now that my face is blue. Think its time I listen up. Ive already said enough
english.segment4: Sometimes I do this. Thing is Im so afraid. When it gets quiet. What you might have to say
english.segment5: Cause Im guilty of. Overcompensation. Im lost in my. Own translation. I apologize, I know I. Should listen to your heart
english.segment7: There isnt anything that I could say. Not a word to get in the way. Of you, Of You, I am listening
